snippet.title: AWAKEN - Astral Blade Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1716310/AWAKEN__Astral_Blade/

ESDigital Games shared a gameplay trailer for AWAKEN - Astral Blade, the studio's dark fairy tale metroidvania. It's set to launch on PC and PlayStation in Q3 2024. 

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #awakenastralblade #awakenastralbladegame
